lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a journalist at a newspaper that is published weekly ‚Äî The Wallowa County Chieftain. It is the newspaper for an entire rural county in Northeast Oregon ‚Äî Wallowa County. Wallowa County is remote and beautiful and was the homeland of a famous Native American, the Nez Perce Chief Joseph.The county has millions acres of National Forest, Wilderness and other rugged land within county boundaries and in the winter a sled-dog race occurs in our Eagle Cap Wilderness for teams who wish to qualify for the famous Iditerod Race in Alaska. It is very difficult to make a living in Wallowa County and many people (including me) have two or more jobs. It is a "true western" American area with many real cowboys and ranchers from families that have lived in the area for over 100 years. The white residents are very friendly with members of the Nez Perce Tribe, which now owns land in the area and is very active in preserving fisheries. It is also a county filled with noted artists of all kinds ‚Äî and three very famous bronze founderies. The little town of Joseph boasts numerous more-than-life-sized bronze works of art all down the main street. The photo I feature is from a special day of spring plowing with horses. Most farmers now use tractors, but people in the area love horses and continue to work with them and celebrate plowing with horses at this spring event. The area is also famous for mules (cross between a female horse and a male donkey) and has one the most famous festivals for mules in the United States. The mountains here are so steep that mules are often the best animals to traverse them.

lender.name: victoria

lender.occupational_info: I OWN A BOTIQUE IN MONROVIA, LIBERIA AND I LOVE FASHION.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Rabbis of the Talmud taught that the primary purpose of charity is to help others help themselves: 'He who lends is greater than he who performs charity, and he who puts in capital to form a partnership with the poor is greater than all.'"

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: No mountain is too high to climb. Aim high and realize your goals..hard work and patience WILL pay off!

lender.name: D.M.
lender.loan_because: I can. We're all on this earth together and if we can't help each other, who will?

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I believe that when we help one person, we all win; and if we turn our backs we all lose.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help make a difference in people's lives

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Amenda
lender.loan_because: I have great respect for the people and stories featured here.

lender.name: Suzan Michele
lender.occupational_info: Environmental activist with a web-based business featuring watercolors on gift items of the California Marine Life Sanctuaries, I support many non-profits that care for the earth and its wildlife.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I can help heal the world - one loan at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I solve problems involving big claims and big insurance companies.

lender.name: Carolann
lender.loan_because: my mother sally taught me that there is always someone out there you can help
lender.occupational_info: Education of children 10 and 11 years old

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want local entrepreneurs to help better the lives of those in their communities.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: even though I don't a tremendous amount of money myself, I can make a contribution towards helping someone.
lender.occupational_info: IT

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michael Fee
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserve a chance at success. We can all do a little more to help...

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
lender.occupational_info: I interview people who provide information about the abuse, neglect or exploitation of children and elderly/disabled adults. Then I create a report for the investigative field.

lender.name: Ingo & Loretta
lender.loan_because: A dear friend gave us a Kiva gift certificate for our wedding and made us aware of this organization. What a great gift! We are happy to contribute to some exciting ventures and to help develop opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Loretta helps other people make good career choices and find better jobs. Ingo teaches leadership, organizational change and creativity.

lender.name: tiffany
lender.occupational_info: I make quilt tops and quilt them together with a longarm quilting machine.

lender.name: Theo
lender.loan_because: I want to expand my business in Aussenkehr Farms in order to assist my daily growing number of clients.
lender.occupational_info: SME

lender.name: Vera
lender.loan_because: I would like to make it a bit easier for someone to accomplish a goal.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps employers offer the best health benefits available to their employees.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people trying to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Luis
lender.occupation: just a man wanting to succed with family&profess

lender.name: Matt & Kristin Shemwell
lender.loan_because: we want to make a difference in real people's lives.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: To give back to the world
lender.occupational_info: Sales/Marketing

lender.name: noah feldman
lender.loan_because: i have more than i need and i like the hepling that i helped somebody

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I buy aircraft parts for an airline.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is the proven sustainable means by which we can eradicate poverty!
lender.occupational_info: Currently enrolled in BGI's MBA program after 10 years working in public health (domestic & global HIV/AIDS).

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in Canada and live a good life and I want others to have the same opportunity. We should learn to help others more than ourselves.

lender.name: Aislinn and Glenn
lender.loan_because: we are all connected. It's made a huge difference in our lives when people have believed in us so we're going to start spreading our belief in others around.
lender.occupational_info: one of us writes books (stories and poems) and teaches at a University and the other one manages a shop that sells wine and spirits. We live in western Canada.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: It helps people less fortunate then I.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: A hand up is always better than a hand out.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: Hardworking people need a break.

lender.name: Richter Family
lender.loan_because: Our family has been blessed with health and happiness. We are inspired by all of the entrepreneurs on Kiva and believe it is an honor to help others improve their lives and the lives of their children.

lender.name: One World
lender.occupational_info: human to human interactions of love and empathy.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: A little bit goes a long way. I love this because there's nothing in it for me - it's not completely altruistic because I get such joy from 'lending'.

lender.name: Zeynep
lender.loan_because: It is more empowering, sustainable and dignifying than charity.
lender.occupational_info: I write academic articles and teach

lender.name: eddie
lender.loan_because: my wife told me so :-)

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: this is a fantastic opportunity to help those that just need a little support for their endeavors!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student interested in progressing medical care in developing countries, but also have a great passion for the arts.

lender.name: Bielmans
lender.loan_because: Jesus tells us to
lender.occupational_info: We are a minister and a public school teacher.

lender.name: Jorge
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of supporting each other
lender.occupational_info: Manage computer systems.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I design Bridges and other Structures.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Awesome, thank you!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by the loving grace of God and I want to be a part of what makes a difference for the good of all people. God Bless you :)
